price: 114. Akolobaka: Bovandaki sé tango ya mokie, ya sólo soki bozali koyeba.
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
